snippet: Seven students were charged in connection with a series of sexual assaults that prompted Sayreville War Memorial High School to cancel the rest of its football season.
abstract: Seven New Jersey teenagers are charged in connection with series of sexual assaults in hazing scandal that prompted Sayreville War Memorial High School to cancel the rest of its football season; officials are withholding their identities because they are under age of 18.
lead_paragraph: Seven students were charged in connection with a series of sexual assaults that prompted Sayreville War Memorial High School to cancel the rest of its football season.

headline.main: High School Football Players Charged in N.J. Hazing Case
headline.print_headline: 7 Teenagers Are Charged in Sex Assaults at School
